description:
The Three Cho Sisters meet a traveling magician and receive a mysterious book that amplifies their magical powers as well as their traveling act.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chou San Shimai, Taihei Youjutsu o Te ni Ireru no Koto
The Three Chou Sisters Acquire the "Crucial Keys to the Way of Peace"
張三姉妹, 太平要術を手に入れるのこと
